mosinstall.name: EZ Autos Latest Sellers
mosinstall.author: K.J. Strickland
mosinstall.description: This module shows a photo list of the latest sellers to create profiles.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: count
param.label: Total Sellers
param.description: The number of new seller profile images to display (default is 6)

param.name: colcount
param.label: Column Count
param.description: Number of columns across the page (default is 2)

param.name: colwidth
param.label: Column Width
param.description: Width of columns in terms of percentage - you must include the percentage sign (default is 50%)
